summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 COLUMBIA ALINER CLASSIC TRAILER. THE CONTACT STATED WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 60 MPH THE VEHICLE BEGAN TO PULL TO THE LEFT. THE VEHICLE WAS MANEUVERED TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD WHERE THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT THE REAR TRAILER AXLE  FRACTURED CAUSING THE VEHICLE TO PULL THE LEFT AND EXIT THE ROADWAY. THE FRACTURE CAUSED DAMAGE TO THE REAR DRIVER'S SIDE TIRE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN AUTHORIZED DEALER, WHO STATED THAT THE FAULTY AXLE WOULD NEED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED DUE TO THE PART BEING ON A MASSIVE BACK ORDER. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE PROBLEM. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 2,500.   ...UPDATED 07-15-13 *BF
